verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> that he <S%H7760>made<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> was <S%H3100>Joel;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H4932>second,<s%> <S%H29>Abiah:<s%> they were <S%H8199>judges<s%> in <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> but <S%H5186>turned<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1215>lucre,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7810>bribes,<s%> and <S%H5186>perverted<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves together, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you are <S%H2204>old,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> not in your <S%H1870>ways:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> us a <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> us like <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

But the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H7489>displeased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> us a <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> us. And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that they <S%H559>say<s%> to you: for they have not <S%H3988>rejected<s%> you, but they have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> me, that I should not <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

According to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5927>brought<s%> them up out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> with which they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> they <S%H1571>also<s%> to you.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H8085>listen<s%> to their <S%H6963>voice:<s%> <S%H389>however,<s%> <S%H3588>yet<s%> <S%H5749>protest<s%> <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> to them, and <S%H5046>show<s%> them the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> that shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7592>asked<s%> of him a <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> will be the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> that shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> over you: He will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them for himself, for his <S%H4818>chariots,<s%> and to be his <S%H6571>horsemen;<s%> and some shall <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4818>chariots.<s%>

And he will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> him <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H2572>fifties;<s%> and will set them to <S%H2790>ear<s%> his <S%H2758>ground,<s%> and to <S%H7114>reap<s%> his <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and to <S%H6213>make<s%> his <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>
And he will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be <S%H7543>confectionaries,<s%> and to be <S%H2876>cooks,<s%> and to be <S%H644>bakers.<s%>

And he will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and your <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and your olive <S%H2132>groves,<s%> even the <S%H2896>best<s%> of them, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
And he will take the <S%H6237>tenth<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and of your <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> to his <S%H5631>officers,<s%> and to his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And he will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and your <S%H8198>maidservants,<s%> and your <S%H2896>best<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> men, and your <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and <S%H6213>put<s%> them to his <S%H4399>work.<s%>
He will take the <S%H6237>tenth<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> and you shall be his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And you shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> out in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will not <S%H6030>hear<s%> you in that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Nevertheless the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> but we will <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us;

That we <S%H1571>also<s%> may be like <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and that our <S%H4428>king<s%> may <S%H8199>judge<s%> us, and <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> us, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> our <S%H4421>battles.<s%>
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he <S%H1696>rehearsed<s%> them in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and make them a <S%H4428>king.<s%> And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> you every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5892>city.<s%>
